thread.title: Joel Solomon
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Joel Solomon

author: Joel Solomon
title: Joel Solomon
text:
Optima Tax Relief was everything they said they were.
They were courteous, attentive and resolved to help their clients obtain a satisfactory end for a very discouraging situation.
They explained every detail and followed up on every item.
I would recommend Optima Tax Relief to anyone with IRS issues.
